attributes.additional_details: The daily mail is not a newspaper at all. It is a vile piece of propaganda which incites hatred and persecuted individuals it dislikes, which is seemingly anyone not white, rich, male, rabidly right wing and living in the south east. it is racist and thoroughly mean spirited and nasty, in short it represents everything negative and is a national disgrace. Close it down and, to use one of its headlines ban this sick filth!
